verses.verse: Am<WG1510> I not<WG3756> an apostle<WG652>? Am<WG1510> I not<WG3756> free<WG1658>? Have I not<WG3780> seen<WG3708> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962>? Are<WG2075> not<WG3756> you<WG5210> my<WG3450> work<WG2041> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>?

What<WG5101> is<WG2076> my<WG3427> reward<WG3408> then<WG3767>? Truly that<WG2443>, when I preach the gospel<WG2097>, I may make<WG5087> the gospel<WG2098> of Christ<WG5547> without charge<WG1519>, that I abuse<WG2710> not<WG3361> my<WG3450> power<WG1849> in<WG1722> the gospel<WG2098>.
For<WG1063> though I am<WG5607> free<WG1658> from<WG1537> all<WG3956> men<WG1402>, yet have I made myself<WG1683> servant<WG1402> unto all<WG3956>, that<WG2443> I might gain<WG2770> the more<WG4119>.

I<WG1473> therefore<WG5106> so<WG3779> run<WG5143>, not<WG3756> as<WG5613> uncertainly<WG84>; so<WG3779> fight I<WG4438>, not<WG3756> as<WG5613> one that beats<WG1194> the air<WG109>:
